title: Pan con Tomate (Spanish Tomato Bread)
ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
method: Step 1: Place tomato in a blender; blend until smooth.
Step 2: Toast the bread until browned, 1 to 3 minutes. Rub each slice of toast with garlic; this is easier to do if the peel is left on.
Step 3: Top each slice of toast with pureed tomato. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
